meanings.sent1: The sugar remained undissolved in the water.
meanings.sent2: The undissolved powder clumped together at the bottom of the container.
meanings.sent3: The undissolved salt crystals formed a tiny mountain in the glass.
meanings.sent4: Her undissolved anger lingered in the air long after the argument.
meanings.sent5: The undissolved puzzle piece stood out, waiting to be placed.

meanings.sent1: The undissolved ice cubes floated in the drink.
meanings.sent2: The undissolved chunks of fruit added texture to the smoothie.
meanings.sent3: The undissolved chocolate chips in the cookie dough created a delicious surprise.
meanings.sent4: His undissolved determination shone through despite the setbacks.
meanings.sent5: The undissolved rock stood out among the smooth pebbles on the beach.
